{"post_stream":{"posts":[{"id":3716530,"name":"Aidan","username":"FieryFuryGame","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fieryfurygame/{size}/262141_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-16T16:21:17.190Z","cooked":"

Hello! For offseason, our team is working on getting 3D pose estimation of coral using color detection. We have an Arducam OV9782 camera to do this, running on an Orange Pi 5. We went through the calibration process for the camera, and our detection returns 0.000 meters in all directions when in 3D mode. Calibrating our AprilTag cameras (OV9281) has been successful and accurate. Is there anything that needs to be done differently on a color sensor compared to our tag cameras?

Thank you!

","post_number":1,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-08-16T23:35:24.937Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":12,"reads":149,"readers_count":148,"score":109.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":505364,"topic_slug":"photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly","display_username":"Aidan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":2,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":74068,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1262 Programming Lead / Offseason Drive Coach"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly/505364/1","custom_user_title":"1262 Programming Lead / Offseason Drive Coach","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null,"can_vote":false},{"id":3716557,"name":"Sam","username":"Sam948","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sam948/{size}/261363_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-16T17:01:41.379Z","cooked":"

Object detection doesn’t currently support 3d mode, so you won’t get anything useful from it. It’s currently in the works, but we don’t have a timeline on when it might be implemented.

","post_number":2,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-08-16T17:01:41.379Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":144,"readers_count":143,"score":33.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":505364,"topic_slug":"photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly","display_username":"Sam","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63767,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"8847A | PV"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly/505364/2","custom_user_title":"8847A | PV","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3716637,"name":"Aidan","username":"FieryFuryGame","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fieryfurygame/{size}/262141_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-16T19:16:49.044Z","cooked":"

Ok! Is this the case for color detection? That’s what we’ve been trying to use, as we think it might deal with coral better.

","post_number":3,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-08-16T19:16:49.044Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":112,"readers_count":111,"score":37.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":505364,"topic_slug":"photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly","display_username":"Aidan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":63767,"username":"Sam948","name":"Sam","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sam948/{size}/261363_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":74068,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1262 Programming Lead / Offseason Drive Coach"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly/505364/3","custom_user_title":"1262 Programming Lead / Offseason Drive Coach","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3716663,"name":"Sam","username":"Sam948","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/sam948/{size}/261363_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-16T19:42:55.399Z","cooked":"

I believe it ought to be supported for colored shapes, as that returns an outline not just a bounding box.

","post_number":4,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-08-16T19:42:55.399Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":3,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":109,"readers_count":108,"score":36.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":505364,"topic_slug":"photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly","display_username":"Sam","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":74068,"username":"FieryFuryGame","name":"Aidan","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fieryfurygame/{size}/262141_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":1}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63767,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"8847A | PV"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly/505364/4","custom_user_title":"8847A | PV","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":1,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3716691,"name":"Chris Gerth","username":"gerthworm","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/gerthworm/{size}/268658_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-16T20:33:46.437Z","cooked":"

3D mode still requires that an appropriate real-world model for the object being observed is available - the algorithm needs to know what the relationship between real world points are in the detected shape.

There is no target model implemented for Coral. Results will still be inaccurate, unfortunately.

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-08-16T20:33:46.437Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":96,"readers_count":95,"score":79.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":505364,"topic_slug":"photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly","display_username":"Chris Gerth","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://github.com/PhotonVision/photonvision/blob/2eb224a55fd49acacf164d125641c524043e52d3/photon-core/src/main/java/org/photonvision/vision/target/TargetModel.java#L52","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"photonvision/photon-core/src/main/java/org/photonvision/vision/target/TargetModel.java at 2eb224a55fd49acacf164d125641c524043e52d3 · PhotonVision/photonvision · GitHub","clicks":10}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":24617,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":""},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly/505364/5","custom_user_title":null,"reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":4}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3716726,"name":"billbo911","username":"billbo911","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/billbo911/{size}/110890_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-16T22:07:19.432Z","cooked":"

Make sure that you are not confusing Object Detection with Colored Shape. They are two different pipelines, with two different use cases.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-08-16T22:07:19.432Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":84,"readers_count":83,"score":51.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":505364,"topic_slug":"photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly","display_username":"billbo911","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://docs.photonvision.org/en/latest/docs/reflectiveAndShape/index.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Colored Shape & Reflective - PhotonVision Docs","clicks":3},{"url":"https://docs.photonvision.org/en/latest/docs/objectDetection/about-object-detection.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"About Object Detection - PhotonVision Docs","clicks":1}],"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":4760,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"KN6MPS, WRWZ842"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly/505364/6","custom_user_title":"KN6MPS, WRWZ842","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":2}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3716769,"name":"Aidan","username":"FieryFuryGame","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/fieryfurygame/{size}/262141_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-16T23:34:25.186Z","cooked":"

I know! I just messed up my wording in the original thread post. We’re using color detection because of coral’s slightly odd shape, which makes object detection slightly more unstable. I wish I had a picture of some sort to explain my issue better, but I couldn’t get one. 3D calibration is linked in the colored pipeline section of the documentation, so I figure something is wrong with how I’m calibrating that specific camera.

Sorry I haven’t explained my issue the best.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":8,"updated_at":"2025-08-16T23:34:25.186Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":9,"reads":72,"readers_count":71,"score":64.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":505364,"topic_slug":"photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly","display_username":"Aidan","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":4760,"username":"billbo911","name":"billbo911","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/billbo911/{size}/110890_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":74068,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"1262 Programming Lead / Offseason Drive Coach"},"post_url":"/t/photonvision-how-do-we-calibrate-a-color-camera-correctly/505364/7","custom_user_title":"1262 Programming Lead / Offseason Drive Coach","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3716885,"name":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","username":"SLAB-Mr.Thomas","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/slab-mr.thomas/{size}/182153_2.png","created_at":"2025-08-17T01:21:58.728Z","cooked":"
FieryFuryGame:

coral’s slightly odd shape

This is why there isn’t a simple, invariant target model that is required for 3D calibration. The model would vary with how much of the rectangular-appearing side is showing vs how much of the ring-appearing end is showing.
